title: mirek92
author: mirek92
content: Hello, I would like to find any reliable platform for presale of crypto tokens.Currently I know about PinkSale and DX Sale but there is fee 1 BNB + 4% of raised funds in both.So do you know any cheaper service or do you know verified source code for building web3 presale for metamask in own website?Thank you

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Remember, cheap isn't always the best. Better look on Fiverr and hire a developer who will create a presale pool for you. If you don't want to spend anything then just sell your token through the old fundraising system. Add an address to send funds and you can send back tokens to the address. So you need to spend just the gas fee. Also, you can Airdrop investors token at once. But I am curious who will buy your token. If you can't spend 1 BNB for a fee then how will you manage marketing? Remember people wouldn't trust any platform to invest in they aren't familiar with. So looking for the cheap costly lesson at the end of the day.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: If you're not looking into using as much capital(because you're looking for cheap services) then why not just simply fork the pre-sale contracts of almost any project?But what are you really trying to achieve with this though?
